overview: Dorothy (“Dot”) Currey is secretary to the Board of Directors, serves as the Chief Officer for Corporate Affairs, and co-founder of Digital Reasoning Systems. As the COCA, Dot establishes and administers the governance of the corporation as well as reviews and advises on all functions of the firm, and helps to guide the formulation and implement of the corporate strategy. She has communications responsibilities to shareholders and potential investors, and coordinates legal matters. Through her 20+ years of experience with such national clients as Texaco, Star Enterprise, Coca-Cola, NASCAR and Tropicana, Dot brings a wealth of experience and knowledge in the national and international marketing and public relations fields. She has been the President and CEO of three marketing centered corporations and has had extensive experience in start up situations. As a Digital ReasoningÂ® Systems co-founder, Dot has been with the company since its inception. She is a graduate of the University of Tennessee, Knoxville.
